nodes.text: Droid Gunships Start Forest Fires! was a Republic propaganda poster created in 19 BBY. It depicted an HMP droid gunship starting a forest fire with the words "Droid Gunships Start Forest Fires!" above it, and the words "Report all sightings to your local Wookiee warden" below it. The poster was written in High Galactic alphabet and was eventually collected in Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy, a book written by the Jedi Master Yoda during his exile on Dagobah.
Droid Gunships Start Forest Fires! was first mentioned in the 2021 non-canon reference book LEGO Star Wars Yoda's Galaxy Atlas.
